hero.description: ByteMC.uz was founded with a simple goal: to provide the best Minecraft server experience for players in Uzbekistan and beyond. Since launch, we've become one of the most popular servers in the region.

mission.title: Our Mission

hero.description: Find answers to common questions about ByteMC. Can't find what you're looking for? Join our Discord!

0.question: How do I join the server?
0.answer: Open Minecraft Java or Bedrock Edition, go to Multiplayer, and add our server address: bytemc.uz. Make sure you're using a supported version.

1.question: What Minecraft versions are supported?
1.answer: We support Minecraft Java Edition 1.8 - 1.20+ and Bedrock Edition. The recommended version is 1.20 for the best experience.

2.question: How do I purchase a rank?
2.answer: Visit our Prices page and select your desired rank. You can pay using various methods including Payme, Click, and Uzcard.

3.question: Can I transfer my rank to another account?
3.answer: Rank transfers are handled on a case-by-case basis. Contact our support team through Discord for assistance.

4.question: What if I get banned?
4.answer: If you believe your ban is unjust, you can file an appeal through our Discord server. All appeals are reviewed by senior staff.

5.question: Are there any rules I need to follow?
5.answer: Yes! We have server rules to ensure fair play and a positive experience. No hacking, no spam, be respectful. Check the full list with /rules in-game.
